long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dive into the world of creativity and challenges with Draw Climber! This physics-based game puts your drawing skills to the test as you navigate through unique terrains and climb to victory. From simple slopes to intricate obstacles, every level is a new adventure. 🚀

✨ Why Install Draw Climber?

✏️ Draw Your Way to Victory: Create legs for your climber and adapt them to the terrain.
🌟 Addictive Gameplay: Simple mechanics, endless creativity, and thrilling challenges.
🎮 Fun for Everyone: Perfect for casual gaming or testing your skills.
💡 Innovative Design: Combines drawing and physics for a unique experience.
🚀 Seamless Experience: Play directly in Chrome with no downloads or interruptions.
🌈 Features You’ll Love:

Customizable climbers with unique skins to unlock.
Physics-based mechanics for unpredictable and exciting gameplay.
Multiple levels, each with distinct terrains and challenges.
Global leaderboards to compete with friends and players worldwide.
🎉 Game Enhancements:

Visit the Menu in the top-left for quick access to levels and challenges.
Use the Rate Us 🌟 and Fullscreen 🔎 options to enhance your experience.
Share your climbing creations on social media and challenge your friends!
